title: Fix global button color to shimmering gold and change body text from silver shimmer to static gold

requirements.text: Update the global styling so every button across the app (storefront + admin + header/footer) renders with a shimmering gold background (not navy blue), overriding any Tailwind/Shadcn button background classes that currently force navy/primary styling, without editing any immutable Shadcn UI component source files.

quotes: The buttons are still in navy blue colour. Make them in shimmering gold.

acceptanceCriteria: No visible buttons render with a navy/blue background in any major surfaces (Home, Product Detail, Cart, Checkout, Customer Dashboard, Admin Dashboard, header navigation).
Primary/secondary/outline/ghost/destructive Shadcn-based buttons still render with the shimmering gold background (or a gold-toned variant where appropriate), not default navy/blue.
Implementation does not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (immutable).

requirements.text: Change button label text color to a metallic silver treatment on top of the shimmering gold button background, ensuring the button text is not affected by the global non-button text shimmer rules and remains readable.

quotes: And text in metallic silver on it.

acceptanceCriteria: All button text appears metallic silver (not dark/black, not gold) on all buttons across the app.
Button icons (if present) match the metallic silver color treatment.
Non-button text styling changes do not accidentally override button text styling.

requirements.text: Replace the current global shimmering silver body text effect with a shimmering gold text finish that is static (no animation), applied consistently to non-button text across pages (including header/footer text where applicable).

quotes: The all body shimmering silver to be changed to shimmering gold without animation.

acceptanceCriteria: Non-button text no longer animates (no shimmer movement) anywhere in the app.
Non-button text uses a gold metallic/shimmer gradient appearance (static) instead of silver.
Buttons continue to render independently from the non-button text rules (no gold-text gradient applied to button labels unless explicitly intended by REQ-2).

constraints: Do not edit immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/components/ui, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Keep theming centralized in global styles (e.g., frontend/src/index.css) and/or app-level composition; do not introduce per-page one-off styling fixes unless necessary.
nonGoals: Do not change authentication, routing, or business logic behavior.
Do not add new product features beyond the styling adjustments requested.
